alert.note: Alert for McLennan (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 19 at 11:35PM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of south central McLennan County through 1215 AM CDT... At 1134 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near McGregor, moving south-southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Waco, Hewitt, Woodway, McGregor, Lorena, Bruceville-Eddy, Moody and Spring Valley. This includes Interstate 35 between mile markers 315 and 324. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
